channel.title: Business on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi
channel.description: Recent content in Business on /dev/ by Massimiliano Pippi

item.title: Anything You Want
item.description: Very inspiring, going through the book was like listening to the author telling his story to a friend. The style is minimalistic, no tricks to produce more pages, no repetitions, always straight to the point. It really makes you want start your own business, and not for the money but rather for the journey and fulfillment.
